      • get

        @GET
@Produces(value="application/json")
public ArrayList<Setting> get(@HeaderParam(value="X-ICE-Authentication-SessionId")
                                  String sessionId)
        Retrieves list of system settings available
        Parameters:
        sessionId - Session Id for user
        Returns:
        list of retrieved system settings that can be changed (including those with no values)

@Path(value="/{key}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public Setting getConfig(@PathParam(value="key")
                                  String key)
        Retrieves the value for the specified config key
        Returns:
        setting containing the passed key and associated value if found
